pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.5: “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā, neva vūpasameti na vūpasamāya ussukkaṁ karoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.6: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.7: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.10: ‘sādhū’ti paṭissuṇitvā, neva vūpasamessati na vūpasamāya ussukkaṁ karissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.13: ‘sādhū’ti paṭissuṇitvā, neva vūpasameti na vūpasamāya ussukkaṁ karotī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.16: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.18: ‘sādhū’ti paṭissuṇitvā, neva vūpasamessati na vūpasamāya ussukkaṁ karissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.20: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:1.21.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā—‘ehāyye, imaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasamehī’ti vuccamānā—‘sādhū’ti paṭissuṇitvā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva vūpasameyya na vūpasamāya ussukkaṁ kareyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:2.1.8: cattāri adhikaraṇāni— vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ, āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:2.1.17: “Neva vūpasamessāmi na vūpasamāya ussukkaṁ karissāmī”ti dhuraṁ nikkhittamatte, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:2.2.1: Upasampannāya upasampannasaññā adhikaraṇaṁ neva vūpasameti na vūpasamāya ussukkaṁ karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:2.2.2: Upasampannāya vematikā adhikaraṇaṁ neva vūpasameti, na vūpasamāya ussukkaṁ karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:2.2.3: Upasampannāya anupasampannasaññā adhikaraṇaṁ neva vūpasameti, na vūpasamāya ussukkaṁ karoti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc45:2.2.4: Anupasampannāya adhikaraṇaṁ neva vūpasameti, na vūpasamāya ussukkaṁ karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
